subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to - Test Case for an Abstract class /   Inteface ?
msgSnippet: It should be. Bear in mind, however, that it is strictly-speaking impossible to test an interface. Since an abstract class is merely a partial implementation
messageBody:
It should be.

Bear in mind, however, that it is strictly-speaking impossible to test an interface. Since an abstract class is merely a partial implementation of an interface, the approach should be the same.

Take care.

>So said mangeshminal on 4/23/2003 --------------------
>Hi Mike,
>
> Thank you very much for updating the FAQ.
>
> This has answered 1 of my questions I've asked in Msg# 7168 & 7170.
>
> I hope same answer will be valid for testing Interfaces (2nd
>question I've asked in Msg# 7168 & 7170).
>
>
>Regards,
>--- Shivprasad M. Bhide
>
